title: Replay files on Beta/Alpha client
body:
Just wondering where the replay files go in my files, so I can find them easier. 

Also, do they get auto deleted after a new patch or do I manually have to delete them?

replies.body:
Per our recent[ Replays Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips), you should be able to find your replays here:

C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends\Highlights

I don't know a whole lot about replays yet, but I believe they will only be available for the duration of the patch it was recorded.  It may not be accessbile once a new patch rolls out.  Feel free to share any feedback to our client devs through the [client board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)s.  Good luck!
